name: The Top Secret Mission To Save The Universe
name_original: The Top Secret Mission To Save The Universe
description:
You are a secret agent who has to stop an evil scientist from destroying the universe. Navigate an endless maze of offices - but be aware: time is ticking!

Controls:
W/A/S/D to move
Space to jump
E to open doors
ESC to open the menu
F11 to activate fullscreen (desktop version only, use button for web version)

GitLab - source code
